definitions: in a straight or nearly straight line

examples.text: the house is a longish structure with rooms linearly arranged

shortDefinitions: in straight or nearly straight line

definitions: in a way that involves one dimension only
shortDefinitions: in way that involves one dimension only

definitions: in a way that can be represented by a straight line on a graph

examples.text: the distribution (when plotted linearly) is broad and asymmetric

shortDefinitions: in way that can be represented by straight line on graph

definitions: in a way that involves or exhibits directly proportional change in two related quantities

examples.text: side effects increase linearly with dosage
growth rate is linearly related to temperature

shortDefinitions: in way that involves or exhibits directly proportional change in two related quantities

definitions: in a way that progresses from one stage to another in a single series of steps; sequentially

examples.text: each individual must proceed linearly through each task
spoken language proceeds linearly, one word after another

shortDefinitions: in way that progresses from one stage to another in single series of steps
